title: The Sultan's Heir
description: After years of suffering under the wrath of his father, Erezhad takes up the mantle of sultan in the hopes to finally see the dawn of peace in the desert land of Zaityra and the neighboring land of Ronan. Under his rule and with the help of his sister, the Princess Saraya, he can give them a hopeful future.Princess Seraya is dedicated to helping with her brother's goal of peace, even if it means working closely with a Ronan guard. Even though he was once an enemy, she isn't afraid of him, but the more time they spend together, she starts to fear losing her heart.Erezhad must ensure the peace and prosperity of his people, but though he has friends on his side, there are those who would manipulate the future for their own ends. The future of Zaityra depends on The Sultan's Heir.The Sultan's Heir novella takes place before The Desert Princess. It is a tale of turmoil, forbidden love, and deception that will appeal to lovers of fantasy adventure epics, young adult, romance, and historical fiction.
author: Christina  Bates
